t: GENEVA SUPPLY ACQUIRES CASCIO INTERSTATE MUSIC I MUSIC INC MAGAZINE

t: GENEVA SUPPLY ACQUIRES CASCIO INTERSTATE MUSIC
s: May 31, 2022 - The award-winning E-Commerce company announced plans for a new online retail site and continued partnerships with global music retail brands. Wisconsin-based Geneva Supply has acquired Cascio Interstate Music, the 14th largest musical instrument dealer in the United States.
